document_data.name: Congee
document_data.mainbody: '''Congee''' was a simple dish of savory and thick [[rice]] [[gruel]] found on the islands of the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Description: Inhabitants of the [[Pirate Isles]] consumed sticky congee, dipping fried [[bread]] into the gruel.
document_data.History: [[Kwan Shang-Li]], a [[half-elven]] [[Shou]] [[monk]], partook in [[fish]]-flavored congee and fried bread during his nautical adventures on the Sea of Fallen Stars in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
